title: Electoral Process (Local Government By-Elections) (Election Date and Time of Poll) (No. 8 ) Order, 2020
content:
Supplement to the Republic of Zambia Government 463
Gazette dated Friday, 25th September, 2020
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO.79 OF2020
The Electoral Process Act, 2016
(Act No.35of2016)
The Electoral Process (Local Government By-Elections)
(Election Date and Time of Poll) (No. 8)
Order, 2020
INEXERCISEofthepowerscontainedinsection125oftheElectoral
ProcessAct,2016,thefollowingOrderismade:
1. This Order may be cited as the Electoral Process (Local Title
GovernmentBy-Elections)(ElectionDateandTimeofPoll)(No.8)
Order,2020.
2. A candidate for election as a councillor in a district and Dateand
timeof
ward set out in the Schedule shall lodge a nomination with the
nomination
returningofficer onThursday,1st October,2020,between 09:00 forelection
hoursand15:00hours.
3. The campaign period shall commence on Thursday, 1st
Campaign
October, 2020, at 15:00 hours and close at 18:00 hours on period
Wednesday,21stOctober,2020.
4. (1) Thepollfortheelectionofacouncillorinadistrictand Electiondate
ward set out in the Schedule shall take place onThursday, 22nd andtimeof
poll
October,2020,between06:00hoursand18:00hours.
(2) Apollshallnotbetakeninadistrictandwardifonlyone
candidateisvalidlynominated.
CopiesofthisStatutoryInstrumentcanbeobtainedfromtheGovernmentPrinter,
P.O.Box30136,10101,Lusaka,PriceK4.00 each
464 StatutoryInstruments 25thSeptember,2020
SCHEDULE
(Paragraphs2and4)
ELECTIONSFORCOUNCILCHAIRPERSON
Province Constituency
Northern Chilubi
ELECTIONSFORCOUNCILLOR
District Constituency Ward No. Name
Mwansabombwe Mwansabombwe 104008003 Kakose
Mwansabombwe Mwansabombwe 104008022 Mbereshi
Made by the Electoral Commission of Zambia at Lusaka this 22nd day of
September,2020.
JUSTICE E.E. CHULU,
Chairperson
E.J. SIKAZWE,
Member
A. D. SIMWINGA,
Member
LUSAKA
22ndSeptember,2020
[EC.101/5/5CONF.]
